/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, creating a vibrant urban landscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
